tools.name: list_files
tools.description: List files and directories within the specified directory.

returns.description: Response containing: - files: List of files and directories - total_files: Total number of files found - total_dirs: Total number of directories found

tools.notes:
- Lists contents alphabetically
- Returns maximum 500 results to avoid overwhelming output

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Perform a regex search across files in a directory.

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: Regular expression pattern to search for

returns.description: Response containing: - output: The search results as a string

tools.notes:
- Searches recursively through subdirectories
- Uses ripgrep for fast searching

examples.description: Search Python files for a pattern

tools.name: str_replace_editor
tools.description: A text editor tool for viewing, creating and editing files.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path to the file to edit

parameters.name: file_text
parameters.description: Required parameter of create command, with the content of the file to be created

parameters.name: view_range
parameters.description: Optional parameter of view command when path points to a file. If none is given, the full file is shown. If provided, the file will be shown in the indicated line number range, e.g. [11, 12] will show lines 11 and 12. Indexing at 1 to start. Setting [start_line, -1] shows all lines from start_line to the end of the file

parameters.name: old_str
parameters.description: Required parameter of str_replace command containing the string in path to replace

parameters.name: new_str
parameters.description: Optional parameter of str_replace command containing the new string (if not given, no string will be added). Required parameter of insert command containing the string to insert

parameters.name: insert_line
parameters.description: Required parameter of insert command. The new_str will be inserted AFTER the line insert_line of path

returns.description: Response containing the result of the operation

tools.notes:
Command details:
- view: Show file contents, optionally with line range
- create: Create a new file with given content
- str_replace: Replace old_str with new_str in file
- insert: Insert new_str after the specified line number
- undo_edit: Revert the last edit made to the file
